014package org.jdbi.v3.core.transaction;
015
016import java.sql.Connection;
017
018/**
019 * Supported transaction isolation levels.
020 */
021public enum TransactionIsolationLevel {
022    NONE(Connection.TRANSACTION_NONE),
023    READ_UNCOMMITTED(Connection.TRANSACTION_READ_UNCOMMITTED),
024    READ_COMMITTED(Connection.TRANSACTION_READ_COMMITTED),
025    REPEATABLE_READ(Connection.TRANSACTION_REPEATABLE_READ),
026    SERIALIZABLE(Connection.TRANSACTION_SERIALIZABLE),
027    /** The transaction isolation level wasn't specified or is unknown to jdbi. */
028    UNKNOWN(Integer.MIN_VALUE);
029
030    private final int value;
031
032    TransactionIsolationLevel(int value) {
033        this.value = value;
034    }
035
036    public int intValue() {
037        return this.value;
038    }
039
040    public static TransactionIsolationLevel valueOf(int val) {
041        switch (val) {
042            case Connection.TRANSACTION_READ_UNCOMMITTED: return READ_UNCOMMITTED;
043            case Connection.TRANSACTION_READ_COMMITTED: return READ_COMMITTED;
044            case Connection.TRANSACTION_NONE: return NONE;
045            case Connection.TRANSACTION_REPEATABLE_READ: return REPEATABLE_READ;
046            case Connection.TRANSACTION_SERIALIZABLE: return SERIALIZABLE;
047            default: return UNKNOWN;
048        }
049    }
050}
